document.full_text: the nation's second-largest teachers' union on thursday endorsed action on pension abuses after coming under criticism because of some cases of public employees receiving extravagant retirement pensions.
document.title: u.s. teachers' union endorses action on pension abuses
lines_and_colors: the nation's second-largest teachers' union on thursday endorsed action on pension abuses after coming under criticism because of some cases of public employees receiving extravagant retirement pensions.
